div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss
Territory of Washington vs. W.D. Coyle

Assault &c - April 15th 1885 Prisoner arrested and returned made by Q. L. Creson Deputy for E.F. Whittier sheriff, by bringing defendant into court case called. when W H Smallwood attorney for defense appeared on his behalf, and trial and continuation as the case was then under investigation before the grand jury then in session
Wherefore prisoner was remanded into the custody of the sheriff subject to order of dist court now in session in Cheney said county and Territory.
The following fees were entered Plaintiff for arrest and returns 1.00 mileage .20 1.20

Justice's Fees Oath .25 filing .15 filing complaint .15 warrant 1.00 filing .15 commitment .50 $2.20 Folio .50 $2.70
Sherrif $1.20
April 15th 1885 I hereby certify that the foregoing is a True copy of all papers in the case of Territory vs. W D Coyle and a correct entry of all fees in this case W.F. Hooker J.P.
Filed April 15-85 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
Found True Bill for For assault with Deadly weapon with Intent to kill
